casebody.data:
In the Matters of MELISSA E., PATRICIA E. No. 79-522-M.P. Supreme Court of Rhode Island. Jan. 10, 1980.

Supreme Court of Rhode Island.

Mary M. Lisi, Asst. Public Defender, for petitioners. *255Chester Lupton, Legal Counsel, Child Welfare Services, Providence.

ORDER

Treating the petition for writ of prohibition as a petition for writ of certiorari, the petition for certiorari is granted and the writ shall issue forthwith. Petitioners’ motion for stay is denied.

DORIS, J., did not participate.
